trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 為所有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 項目提供基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> elements to position and arrange child objects in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 項目來定位及排列 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 應用程式中的子物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects, which are in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>包含的集合<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>中的物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: 加入<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>子系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>隱含地將它加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>項目。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a comprehensive suite of derived <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> implementations, enabling many complex layouts.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供一套完整的衍生<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>實作中，啟用許多複雜的配置。

trans-unit.source: If you want to implement new layout containers, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要實作新的版面配置容器，使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For a demonstration of how to use these methods, see [Create a Custom Content-Wrapping Panel Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何使用這些方法，請參閱[建立自訂內容換行面板範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements do not receive mouse or stylus events if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A> is not defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> 項目不會接收滑鼠或手寫筆事件如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A>未定義。

trans-unit.source: If you need to handle mouse or stylus events but do not want a background for your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要控制代碼滑鼠或手寫筆事件，但不是想要的背景您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Panel elements do not receive focus by default.
trans-unit.target: 面板項目不會接收焦點的預設值。

trans-unit.source: To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要強迫要接收焦點的控制台項目，設定<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property to add two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>屬性來加入兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that is used to fill the area between the borders of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來填滿 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> 框線間之區域的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: This default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements do not receive mouse or stylus events if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A> is not defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> 項目不會接收滑鼠或手寫筆事件如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A>未定義。

trans-unit.source: If you need to handle mouse or stylus events but do not want a background for your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要控制代碼滑鼠或手寫筆事件，但不是想要的背景您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>至<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" /> of child elements of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" /> 之子項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element can only consist of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>元素只可包含數<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: 加入<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>子系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>隱含地將它加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>項目。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this collection with derived <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> classes; use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren%2A> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用這個集合與衍生<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>類別; 請改用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren%2A>集合改為。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> is data bound.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回`null`如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property to add a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>屬性將<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>子系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>項目。

trans-unit.source: The logical parent element of the collection to be created.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之集合的邏輯父項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: An ordered collection of elements that have the specified logical parent.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之邏輯父代的已排序項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the generated <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> to cache information about child elements or to perform incremental layout updates.
trans-unit.target: 使用產生<xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>快取資訊的相關項目子系，或執行累加配置更新。

trans-unit.source: The index position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> child.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 子系的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 在指定之索引位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 子系。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> child of the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 父代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 子系。

trans-unit.source: The element for which to retrieve the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex" /> 值的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex" /> property for a given element.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定項目的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex" /> position of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex" /> 位置。

trans-unit.source: The element is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 項目是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> arranges its descendants in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 是否會以單一維度排列其子系。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> is in one dimension; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 的方向是一個維度，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Among predefined panel elements, only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> returns `true`, because its orientation is in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: 在預先定義的面板項目，只有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>傳回`true`，因為其方向是在單一維度中。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> can override this property.
trans-unit.target: 子類別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>可以覆寫這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> arranges its descendants in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 是否會以單一維度排列其子系。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> is in one dimension; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 的方向是一個維度，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Among predefined panel elements, only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> returns `true`, because its orientation is in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: 在預先定義的面板項目，只有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>傳回`true`，因為其方向是在單一維度中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" /> of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得子項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: An ordered collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 物件的已排序集合。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: The returned collection includes items that are added directly in code, and also items that are generated by data binding.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的集合會包含直接在程式碼中新增項目以及資料繫結所產生的項目。

trans-unit.source: Classes that are derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> should use this property, instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property, for internal overrides such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>應該使用這個屬性，而不是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>屬性，例如 internal 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> is a container for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] items that are generated by an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 項目 (由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 所產生) 的容器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> is an items host; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 執行個體是項目主控件則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot bind data to this property.
trans-unit.target: 您無法將資料繫結至這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to create a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>建立水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is specified within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>內所指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A> property is set to `true` on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, which indicates that the generated items should be placed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A>屬性設定為`true`上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>，這表示，產生的項目應該放在 [面板]。

trans-unit.source: When you specify it this way, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> cannot be replaced by the user of the control without using a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，指定當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>無法取代控制項的使用者，而不使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, do this only if you know that you do not want the panel to be replaced without the use of a template.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果此作業只有您知道您不想要被取代，而不使用範本的面板。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> in a <xref:System.Windows.Style> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Style>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate the logical child elements of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得可逐一查看此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 項目之邏輯子項目的列舉程式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> of the panel, if the panel supports layout in only a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: 若面板只支援單一維度的配置，則為面板的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 面板的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> can override this property.
trans-unit.target: 子類別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>可以覆寫這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A> is `false`, this property value should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A>是`false`，應該忽略這個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> of the panel, if the panel supports layout in only a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: 若面板只支援單一維度的配置，則為面板的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 面板的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A> is `false`, this property value should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A>是`false`，應該忽略這個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The old property value.
trans-unit.target: 舊的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new property value.
trans-unit.target: 新的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> 屬性值已變更。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Draws the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> object during the render pass of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> 項目的呈現階段繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 已加入至集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that was removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection" /> of a visual object is modified.
trans-unit.target: 當視覺物件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection" /> 已修改時叫用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> values are automatically recalculated when child elements are added to or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> 加入或移除集合中項目子系時，會自動重新計算值。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to apply the property value.
trans-unit.target: 要套用屬性值的項目。

trans-unit.source: The order on the z-plane in which this element appears.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目在 Z 平面上出現的順序。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex" /> attached property for a given element.
trans-unit.target: 設定所指定項目的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The greater the `value` of a given `element`, the more likely the `element` is to appear in the foreground.
trans-unit.target: 較大`value`的給定`element`、 越有可能`element`是顯示在前景。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if an `element` has a relatively low `value`, the `element` will likely appear in the background.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果`element`具有相對較低`value`、`element`可能會在背景中看起來。

trans-unit.source: For example, an `element` that has a `value` of 5 will appear above an `element` that has a `value` of 4, which in turn will appear above an `element` that has a value of 3, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`element`具有`value`為 5 會出現上述`element`具有`value`為 4，接著會出現上述`element`值為 3，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: Negative values are allowed, and they continue this precedence pattern.
trans-unit.target: 允許負數值，以及他們繼續此優先順序模式。

trans-unit.source: Members of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection that have equal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> values are rendered in the order in which they appear in the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>具有相等的集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>值以視覺化樹狀結構中的出現的順序轉譯。

trans-unit.source: You can determine the index position of a child by iterating the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以逐一查看的成員，以判斷子系的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates in code how to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> property (by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.SetZIndex%2A> method).
trans-unit.target: 下列範例程式碼中會示範如何設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>屬性 (使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.SetZIndex%2A>方法)。

trans-unit.source: The element is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 項目是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children" /> collection of a panel should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否應該序列化面板的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children" /> collection should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children" /> 集合則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children" /> collection is only serialized if it is not empty and not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children" /> 集合不是空白或 <see langword="null" /> 時，才會序列化該集合。

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要加入做為子系的物件。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects in this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 執行個體中的子系 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 物件數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 子系 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 物件的數目。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex" /> 附加屬性。
